tool_description: Parses resume text and extracts structured content sections including contact information, summary, experience, education, skills, and achievements.

resume_text.description: The complete resume text content to be parsed

format_type.description: Expected resume format: chronological, functional, or combination

error_messages: Empty resume content: Provide non-empty resume text with at least basic sections.
Unrecognizable format: The resume structure is too unclear to parse effectively.
Missing critical sections: Resume must contain at least contact information and one content section.
usage: Input the complete resume text and optionally specify the format type. The tool will extract and structure all identifiable sections.

sections_found.description: Names of all sections successfully identified
